CanvasRenderingContext2DTextRendering.summary: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.textRendering property of the Canvas API provides information to the rendering engine about what to optimize for when rendering text.

remarks.para: The values correspond to the SVG text-rendering attribute (and CSS text-rendering property).

CanvasRenderingContext2DTextRendering.value:
A text-rendering hint to the browser engine.
This one of:The property can be used to get or set the value.
